mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: Bevo Faithful Texture and Lang Pack
mod.description: This Resource Packs adds the Bevonian Language to Minecraft. It contains Vattic's 32x32 faithful pack. With this you can play like Bevo does!

mod.name: BevoPack-lang_only
mod.description: This Resource Packs adds the Bevonian Language to Minecraft. It does not contain any high-resolution textures

mod.name: ejml
mod.description: IC2 Libary.

mod.name: CodeChickenLib
mod.description: Needed for ChickenBones mods

mod.name: Forge Multipart
mod.description: An API for dynamically handling different functional parts in the one block space.

mod.name: Cauldron (MCPC+)
mod.description: Libaries required by Cauldron Servers

mod.name: Scripts
mod.description: Minetweaker Scripts

mod.name: Advanced Machines
mod.description: Extension for IC2 Machines

mod.name: Another Ore Bites the Dust
mod.description: Automaticly detects ores for dust

mod.name: Applied Energistics 2
mod.description: Applied Energistics is a Minecraft Mod with advanced storage systems called ME that lets you store items compactly and in the way you want.

mod.name: Aroma1997Core
mod.description: This is basically a library used by most my other mods.

mod.name: Aroma Backup
mod.description: Automatic Backups

mod.name: AsieLib
mod.description: a library required for all of my current mods

mod.name: Backpack
mod.description: Provides the player with multiple, colored backpacks, which each has the space of a normal chest.

mod.name: Baubles-princess
mod.description: A small addon mod and api that is intended to be used by other mods to add additional inventory slots to a character.

mod.name: BdLib
mod.description: This is a collection of generic code used by bdew's other mods

mod.name: BiblioCraft
mod.description: BiblioCraft adds fancy storage containers including bookcases, armor stands, potion shelves, regular shelves, tool racks, glass weapon cases, wooden desks and wooden chest labels and now add machines, redstone interactions, and eyeware! New in 1.3: Fancy lamps and golden lanterns. Also Tables and enchanted plates!

mod.name: BiblioWoods Biomes O'Plenty Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 16 varietys of wood from Biomes O'Plenty for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Forestry Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 24 varietys of wood from Forestry for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: BiblioWoods Natura Edition
mod.description: Adds support for 13 varietys of wood from Natura for 8 of the wooden block in BiblioCraft.

mod.name: Biomes O' Plenty
mod.description: Adds 87 new, unique biomes!

mod.name: Blood Magic
mod.description: Blood Magic is an arcane art that is practiced by mages who attempt to gather a vast amount of power through utilizing a forbidden material: blood.

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a magic tech mod based on nature.

mod.name: Buildcraft
mod.description: Extending Minecraft with pipes, auto-crafting, quarries, engines and much more!

mod.name: Carpenter's Blocks
mod.description: Adds slopes and a variety of vanilla-inspired blocks that support covers, side covers, overlays, dyes and chiseled patterns.

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds a chisel item that lets you carve blocks like cobblestone or sandstone. Adds two new blocks to world generation: marble and limestone, which can be be carved and crafted into many various building materials.

mod.name: CodeChickenCore
mod.description: Core library for all ChickenBones mods

mod.name: CompactSolars
mod.description: Compact Advanced Solors for IC2

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: Computronics is a Minecraft mod that adds a set of computer peripherals. It is compatible with both ComputerCraft, NedoComputers and OpenComputers

mod.name: Dimensional Anchors
mod.description: Yet another chunkloader mod.

mod.name: Easy Crafting
mod.description: Easily craft items that you have the materials for with just a click of a button!

mod.name: EiraIRC
mod.description: This is an IRC connector that works on both client and server independently.

mod.name: Ender IO
mod.description: A mod which adds compact liquid conduits, energy conduits and redstone conduits, power generation, machinery, remote area access (enderIO), transceivers and more

mod.name: Ender Storage
mod.description: EnderStorage is a mod that offers a means to store your items in The END, causing them to be everywhere and nowhere at the same time. All EnderStorage makes use of the magic of colors to link storage with its little piece of The END. Any EnderStorage with the same color code share inventory (even across dimensions).

mod.name: ExtraCells
mod.description: A Mod that adds 4 new ME Storage Cells and some other cool stuff to AE.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of fairly useful things

mod.name: Factorization
mod.description: Auto-crafting, ore processing, barrels, and other toys

mod.name: Flaxbeards Steam Power
mod.description: A tech mod based on steam power

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Bee and Tree Breeding, farms, backpacks, mail system, and power production

mod.name: GrowthCraft
mod.description: Shared files within GrowthCraft

mod.name: GrowthCraft Apples
mod.description: Improves the way of farming apples and addition of Apple Ciders.

mod.name: GrowthCraft Bamboo
mod.description: Adds bamboos which can be crafted to fresh looking aesthetics

mod.name: GrowthCraft Core: Cellar
mod.description: Shared files within GrowthCraft

mod.name: GrowthCraft Grapes
mod.description: Adds Grapes which can be brewed into Grape Wine.

mod.name: GrowthCraft Hops
mod.description: Adds Hops which can be brewed into Ale.

mod.name: GrowthCraft Rice
mod.description: Adds rice which can be crafted to rice balls and brewed into rice wine

mod.name: Immibis Core
mod.description: This is like CodeChicken Core, Buildcraft Core, RedPower Core, and so on - it provides requirements for other mods.

mod.name: IndustrialCraft 2
mod.description: Industrial age themed expansion for Minecraft.

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: IronChests 5.0, formerly an IC2 addon mod, now completely IC2 independent

mod.name: JABBA
mod.description: Just Another Better Berral Attempt

mod.name: LaunchGUI
mod.description: Creates a menu with a single button and up to 10 lines of text right before the main menu. It will disable itself once the button is pressed

mod.name: Mantle
mod.description: Core for TCon

mod.name: Mekanism
mod.description: Energy, Armor, Tools, Weapons, Machines, Magic.

mod.name: MekanismGenerators
mod.description: Generators module of Mekanism.

mod.name: MekanismTools
mod.description: Tools module for Mekanism.

mod.name: MineMenu
mod.description: this fancy new radial menu, you put the power of 10 keys…that’s right, 10! Into the comfort of only one.

mod.name: MineTweaker
mod.description: MineTweaker is a mod that enables players and server admins to alter recipes (both crafting recipes, furnace recipes and now also some mod machine recipes) as well as changing some small things such as item names, fuel burning times, ... For all these functions, MineTweaker uses a fully scripted language, making it easy to understand and offering a lot of functionality.

mod.name: ModTweaker
mod.description: Addon for MineTweaker 3

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Natura
mod.description: Natura is a mod that aims to spice up the world with interesting worldgen.

mod.name: NedoComputers
mod.description: This mod adds computers, almost the same as were in RedPower 2. NedoForth used in this mod, similar to MineOS of RedPower.

mod.name: NotEnoughItems
mod.description: Allows you to quickly and easily look up recipes and uses for any item in Minecraft included modded items. Also allows easy spawning of items and a range of one click utilities.

mod.name: NEI Addons
mod.description: Adds in mod integration into NEI by showing bee breeding information as well as other helpful mod plugins.

mod.name: OpenComputers
mod.description: This mod adds programmable, modular and persistent computers to the game.

mod.name: OpenEye
mod.description: Our primary aim is to collect and share vital information to allow us to provide a set of tools to the community to make the experience easier, drama-free and more secure for both users and modders.

mod.name: Pam's Harvestcraft
mod.description: Expanded food system including tons of new crops!

mod.name: PneumaticCraft
mod.description: A technical mod all about pneumatics!

mod.name: Progressive Automation
mod.description: This mod provides low tech automation tools for common tasks. The tools will be upgradable as the player progresses.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Project Red
mod.description: A mod all about redstone tinkering.

mod.name: Refined Relocation
mod.description: Players of modded Minecraft face many problems: chests are too messy, you need to fit that one pipe onto a block, but it doesn't look nice that way, there are too many pipes everywhere etc. Refined Relocation is here to make your modded Minecraft life easier! Not another new system, but something that works with existing systems and makes it better.

mod.name: Roguelike Dungeons Mod
mod.description: A mod that adds random dungeon complexes to the world

mod.name: Rotateable Blocks
mod.description: Rotatable blocks lets you rotate most full size opaque cube blocks in minecraft, and mods to a total of 24 orientations.

mod.name: Ruins
mod.description: Randomly Generated Structures

mod.name: Spice Of Life
mod.description: A mod that encourages dietary variety through diminishing returns.

mod.name: Statues
mod.description: Create statues out of various blocks

mod.name: Steve's Carts 2
mod.description: Steve's Carts 2 introduces a modular system where you can build a huge amount of carts(hundreds of millions) by combining the parts you want.

mod.name: Steve's Factory Manager
mod.description: This mod allows you to move items between different inventories (machines and storage blocks) by specifying it using commands in a flow chart like way.

mod.name: Tinkers' Construct
mod.description: A little of this, a little of that, a lot of tinkering, and a lot of tools

mod.name: TiC Tooltips
mod.description: A simple client-side add-on for Tinkers' Construct that adds relevant stats to all tool and tool part tooltips.

mod.name: The Twilight Forest
mod.description: An enchanted forest dimension.

mod.name: Voxel Map NoRadar
mod.description: Minecraft Map

mod.name: WAILA
mod.description: What Am I Looking At

mod.name: Waila Harvestability
mod.description: A client-side add-on for Waila that adds information about the harvestability of what you are looking at.

mod.name: warp-book
mod.description: teleportation between given points.

mod.name: Whats This Pack
mod.description: What's This Pack, is a simple modpack identifier for those of you who make modpacks and would like your users to have that extra bit of pizzazz in their pack.

mod.name: CoroUtil
mod.description: Ult for Weather Mod

mod.name: Local Weather and Stormfronts
mod.description: The new local weather mod! Replaced vanilla clouds! Stormfronts of varying intensity! Wind! Leaves! Tornadoes!
